about.name: The following questions are from real DMV written tests. These are some of the actual permit questions you will face in California. Each permit practice test question has three answer choices. Select one answer for each question and select "grade this section." You can find this button at the bottom of the drivers license quiz.  For a complete list of questions and answers for California please visit https://cheat-sheets.dmv-written-test.com/en/california/car.

hasPart.name: When driving in fog, you should:

hasPart.assesses: When driving in fog, you should: | When driving in fog, you should: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: When driving in fog, you should slow down and use your low beam headlights. If the fog is so bad that you cannot see, pull off the road and wait for the fog to clear.

suggestedAnswer.text: Slow down and use your low beam headlights.

comment.text: Slow down and use your low beam headlights.

suggestedAnswer.text: Slow down and use your high beam headlights.

comment.text: Slow down and use your high beam headlights.

suggestedAnswer.text: Turn your lights on and off to warn other drivers.

comment.text: Turn your lights on and off to warn other drivers.

acceptedAnswer.text: Slow down and use your low beam headlights.

comment.text: Slow down and use your low beam headlights.

answerExplanation.text: When driving in fog, you should slow down and use your low beam headlights. If the fog is so bad that you cannot see, pull off the road and wait for the fog to clear.

hasPart.text: It is best to postpone driving until a fog clears. However, if you must drive in the fog, you should do so slowly and use your windshield wipers and low beam headlights.

comment.text: Fog lights only.
High beams.
Low beams.
Low beams.

answerExplanation.text: It is best to postpone driving until a fog clears. However, if you must drive in the fog, you should do so slowly and use your windshield wipers and low beam headlights.

hasPart.name: You drive defensively when you:
hasPart.assesses: You drive defensively when you: | You drive defensively when you: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: You are driving defensively when you are looking down the road for potential hazards. Constantly staring at the road directly in front of your vehicle is dangerous. As you scan ahead, be alert to vehicles around you.

suggestedAnswer.text: Put one car length between you and the car ahead.

comment.text: Put one car length between you and the car ahead.

suggestedAnswer.text: Look only at the car in front of you while driving.

comment.text: Look only at the car in front of you while driving.

suggestedAnswer.text: Keep your eyes moving to look for possible hazards.

comment.text: Keep your eyes moving to look for possible hazards.

acceptedAnswer.text: Keep your eyes moving to look for possible hazards.

comment.text: Keep your eyes moving to look for possible hazards.

answerExplanation.text: You are driving defensively when you are looking down the road for potential hazards. Constantly staring at the road directly in front of your vehicle is dangerous. As you scan ahead, be alert to vehicles around you.

comment.text: You drive defensively when you: | You are driving defensively when you are looking down the road for potential hazards. Constantly staring at the road directly in front of your vehicle is dangerous. As you scan ahead, be alert to vehicles around you.

hasPart.name: With a Class C driver license, a person may drive:

about.name: With a Class C driver license, a person may drive:

hasPart.assesses: With a Class C driver license, a person may drive: | With a Class C driver license, a person may drive: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: A person with a Class C license may drive a three-axle vehicle if it weighs 6,000 pounds or less.

suggestedAnswer.text: A three-axle vehicle if the Gross Vehicle Weight is less than 6,000 pounds.

comment.text: A three-axle vehicle if the Gross Vehicle Weight is less than 6,000 pounds.

suggestedAnswer.text: Any three-axle vehicle, regardless of the weight.

comment.text: Any three-axle vehicle, regardless of the weight.
A vehicle pulling two trailers.

acceptedAnswer.text: A three-axle vehicle if the Gross Vehicle Weight is less than 6,000 pounds.

comment.text: A three-axle vehicle if the Gross Vehicle Weight is less than 6,000 pounds.

answerExplanation.text: A person with a Class C license may drive a three-axle vehicle if it weighs 6,000 pounds or less.

hasPart.name: It is illegal to leave a child age six or younger unattended in a vehicle on a hot day:

about.name: It is illegal to leave a child age six or younger unattended in a vehicle on a hot day:

hasPart.assesses: It is illegal to leave a child age six or younger unattended in a vehicle on a hot day: | It is illegal to leave a child age six or younger unattended in a vehicle on a hot day: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: It is never a good idea to leave a child unattended in a car. It is illegal to leave a child age six or younger unattended in a vehicle. A child may be left under the supervision of a person age 12 or older.

suggestedAnswer.text: Even if they are secured in a child passenger restraint system.

comment.text: Even if they are secured in a child passenger restraint system.

suggestedAnswer.text: If they are supervised by a person twelve years of age or older.

comment.text: If they are supervised by a person twelve years of age or older.

suggestedAnswer.text: Only if the key is in the ignition.

comment.text: Only if the key is in the ignition.

acceptedAnswer.text: Even if they are secured in a child passenger restraint system.

comment.text: Even if they are secured in a child passenger restraint system.

answerExplanation.text: It is never a good idea to leave a child unattended in a car. It is illegal to leave a child age six or younger unattended in a vehicle. A child may be left under the supervision of a person age 12 or older.

comment.text: It is illegal to leave a child age six or younger unattended in a vehicle on a hot day: | It is never a good idea to leave a child unattended in a car.
